title: OutcomeMD Launches First Data Intelligence Network for Healthcare Powered by Patient ...

summary.text: **Introduction of Patient Experience Data Network**: OutcomeMD has launched the first-ever data intelligence network powered by patient-reported outcomes (PROMs), designed to transform healthcare innovation with real-world feedback.

**Benefits for Healthcare Providers**: The network allows providers to earn revenue from collecting and utilizing de-identified patient-reported outcomes data, enhancing treatment planning and quality improvement efforts.

**Impact on Biopharmaceutical and Life Sciences Industries**: It provides a new source of evidence reflecting real-world patient experiences, enabling more effective treatment decisions and informing care performance benchmarks across the healthcare ecosystem.
